           <title>£500million a year fails to get more Scots off the couch</title>
           
           <link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland/~3/QocvVWS8MCA/</link>
           

           <description>SCOTS have failed to respond to a £500million a year push to encourage them into being more active, with claims they are too embarrassed to take part in sport or worried that it’s too elite.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=QocvVWS8MCA:hCgTOrtWfTM:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=QocvVWS8MCA:hCgTOrtWfTM:dnMXMwOfBR0"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?d=dnMXMwOfBR0" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=QocvVWS8MCA:hCgTOrtWfTM:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?i=QocvVWS8MCA:hCgTOrtWfTM:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=QocvVWS8MCA:hCgTOrtWfTM:qj6IDK7rITs"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?d=qj6IDK7rITs" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=QocvVWS8MCA:hCgTOrtWfTM:gIN9vFwOqvQ"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?i=QocvVWS8MCA:hCgTOrtWfTM:gIN9vFwOqvQ" border="0"></img></a>

           <link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland/~3/huM5LYrzlt0/</link>

</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland/~4/WnxC-WKlSJM" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

    <item>
           <title>Leonard pledges to breathe "new life" in to Scottish Labour</title>
           
           <link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland/~3/jcprrQ6o-gk/</link>
           

           <description>RICHARD Leonard today promises to emulate Jeremy Corbyn and breathe “new life” into the Scottish Labour Party and create “real change” for Scotland as he joins the UK party leader at a joint press conference in Glasgow.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=jcprrQ6o-gk:OQK6TOHNIPg:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=jcprrQ6o-gk:OQK6TOHNIPg:dnMXMwOfBR0"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?d=dnMXMwOfBR0" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=jcprrQ6o-gk:OQK6TOHNIPg:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?i=jcprrQ6o-gk:OQK6TOHNIPg:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=jcprrQ6o-gk:OQK6TOHNIPg:qj6IDK7rITs"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?d=qj6IDK7rITs" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=jcprrQ6o-gk:OQK6TOHNIPg:gIN9vFwOqvQ"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?i=jcprrQ6o-gk:OQK6TOHNIPg:gIN9vFwOqvQ" border="0"></img></a>

           <title>Far from A&E: How extreme medicine is helping astronauts, explorers and conflict victims</title>
           
           <link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland/~3/oiyq-F6jVtc/</link>
           

           <description>WHAT do Arctic explorer Pen Hadow, extreme cyclist Mark Beaumont, Dr Saleyah Ahsan of Trust Me I’m A Doctor, and NASA astronaut Mike Barratt have in common? Answer, they have all, in some way, benefited from, or been involved in, what’s called ‘extreme medicine’ – emergency care delivered far from hospitals and safety.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=oiyq-F6jVtc:BHAEgJgC31I:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=oiyq-F6jVtc:BHAEgJgC31I:dnMXMwOfBR0"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?d=dnMXMwOfBR0" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=oiyq-F6jVtc:BHAEgJgC31I:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?i=oiyq-F6jVtc:BHAEgJgC31I:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=oiyq-F6jVtc:BHAEgJgC31I:qj6IDK7rITs"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?d=qj6IDK7rITs" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?a=oiyq-F6jVtc:BHAEgJgC31I:gIN9vFwOqvQ"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland?i=oiyq-F6jVtc:BHAEgJgC31I:gIN9vFwOqvQ" border="0"></img></a>

    <item>
           <title>Colin Farrell to star in movie of Scotland's Homeless World Cup</title>
           
           <link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/ScottishNewsHeraldScotland/~3/YGFkOB_I-nA/</link>
           

           <description>THE HOMELESS World Cup was founded in Scotland and it has changed lives around the globe. But now its emotional highs and lows – that see formerly homeless men and women trained up to play for their home countries in an annual international tournament – is to be the subject of a big budget movie.<div class="feedflare">
